title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Skills: Technology Integration Design Competency Module for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Preservice science teachers can apply the MAGDAIRE framework’s four stages (Modeling Analysis-Guide Development-Implementation Clarification-Evaluation Reflection) to design technology-integrated lessons with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can select one science subject topic, analyze three or more educational applications of technology tools, and incorporate them into a lesson design plan.
Learners can implement a 10-minute microlearning activity with over 90% participation using mobile-accessible digital resources (AR/VR/quiz tools, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
